author: Robert Edgijex
title: The Dark Paladin Of Baltimore
introduction: In the rain-slicked shadows of Baltimore, a city that runs on desperation, a boy named David is a walking, breathing miracle. He is an Edgijex, a scion of a fabled bloodline with the power to heal the incurable, mend shattered bones, and even reverse the tide of age itself.
author_comment: Thank you for being so open with me. You are the most helpful partner!
